title: [P2] Prevent input loss when queueing mid-run message fails
description: In TUI Enter handling during running task, clear input only if message enqueue succeeded; otherwise keep input and surface status error.

logs.msg: Patched src/tui/events.rs Enter-while-running path: message input is now cleared only after successful queue insertion. If queue is unavailable (edge race), input remains intact and a status error prompts user to press Enter again. Validation: cargo test -q 444 pass.
